DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine infrequent administration oral vitamin D megadoses effective treatment maintain serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( 3 ) target level 50-75 nmol/L . The investigator hypothesize 100 000 IU least 200 000 IU vitamin D3 every three month would effective safe treatment achieve target level .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Oral Vitamin D Megadoses
DOC.criteria: female 7080 yr old disease medication affect calcium homeostasis renal failure ( PtGFReCG < 35 ml/min )
